org.grouplens.lenskit.basic

Class AbstractRatingPredictor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.grouplens.lenskit.basic.AbstractRatingPredictor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RatingPredictor
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    OrdRecRatingPredictor, QuantizedRatingPredictor, SimpleRatingPredictor

    public abstract class AbstractRatingPredictor
extends java.lang.Object
implements RatingPredictor
    Base class to make rating predictors easier to implement. Delegates all predict methods to RatingPredictor.predict(long, MutableSparseVector).

    • Method Detail

      • predict

        @Nonnull
public SparseVector predict(long user,
                           @Nonnull
                           java.util.Collection<java.lang.Long> items)
        Predict the user's preference for a collection of items.

        Delegates to RatingPredictor.predict(long, MutableSparseVector).

        Specified by:
        predict in interface RatingPredictor
        Parameters:
        user - The user ID for whom to generate predicts.
        items - The items to predict for.
        Returns:
        A mapping from item IDs to predicted preference. This mapping may not contain all requested items.

      • predict

        public double predict(long user,
             long item)
        Predict a user's rating for a single item.

        Delegates to predict(long, java.util.Collection).

        Specified by:
        predict in interface RatingPredictor
        Parameters:
        user - The user ID for whom to generate a prediction.
        item - The item ID whose rating is to be predicted.
        Returns:
        The predicted preference, or Double.NaN if no preference can be predicted.
